category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIAMANAGERV4_load_catia2d
preference.preference_description: If the value of this setting is true or it is not set, a catia2d dataset can be loaded inside a CATIA assembly. If the value of this setting is false, loading a Named Reference of a catia2d dataset placed under the item revision in an assembly context in CATIA is disabled
